name: Holy Smokes
paragraphs: After years of winning on the BBQ competition circuit, Gary Lanton turned his passion into a full-time career, and in 2015, Holy Smokes BBQ was born. What began as a dream to bring championship-level flavor to the public quickly became a community staple and a source of pride for Dublin, Georgia.
With a win on BBQ Pitmasters and the title of Best Ribs in Georgia from the Food Network, Gary's world-class BBQ has put his hometown on the map.
More than just smoked meat, Holy Smokes delivers decades of experience, expert technique, and deep Southern soul. Every bite tells a story of passion, pride, and the pursuit of BBQ perfection.

name: Lou Ann's Biscuits & Burgers
paragraphs: For 58 years, Lou Ann's Biscuits & Burgers has been a beloved part of the community known for its scratch-made biscuits, juicy burgers, and heartfelt Southern hospitality. Originally founded by Lou Ann herself, this cozy spot has always been more than a place to eat—it's where memories are made, stories are shared, and community is built.

When Gary and Dionn Lanton were given the opportunity to take over this beloved hometown favorite, they didn't just buy a business—they inherited a legacy. Today, they continue to serve the same comfort food and warmth that generations have come to love. Lou Ann's is about more than food. It's about familiar faces, hometown pride, and that first bite that feels like home.

name: Brian's Subs
paragraphs: Brian's Subs has been serving the Dublin community since 1989, offering more than just sandwiches—it's a local tradition.Founded by Jersey native Brian Keith, the shop quickly earned a reputation for crafting the best subs around, paired with exceptional customer service that keeps folks coming back.

Today, new owners Brad and Robyn Meeks continue that legacy with fresh ingredients, friendly faces, and a passion for building relationships with every customer who walks through the door. Regulars aren't just customers—they're part of the family.

Thanks to the unwavering support of the community, Brian's Subs is proud to remain a cornerstone in Dublin. Whether it's your first visit or your fiftieth, expect a warm welcome, top-notch service, and a sub made just the way you like it.

name: Company Supply
paragraphs: Founded in 2015 by Rich Mascaro, Company Supply has become a culinary staple in historic downtown Dublin. Set in a 120-year-old dry-goods store, the space blends rustic charm and industrial style, complete with reclaimed barn wood and thoughtfully preserved original fixtures. Specializing in Cajun and Creole-inspired cuisine with a Southern twist, the menu features favorites like Catfish Perdu, Crawfish Boudin, and Pork & Crawfish Grillades. Committed to quality, dishes are crafted with farm-to-table ingredients. Guests can sip Georgia Grown microbrews, enjoy a full bar, stop in for morning brunch, or catch live music on select evenings. Whether it's lunch, dinner, brunch, or a private event, Company Supply delivers unforgettable flavors and warm hospitality in a one-of-a-kind, history-rich setting.

name: Crooked Finger Brewing
paragraphs: In the heart of historic downtown Dublin, Crooked Finger Brewing is the community's new favorite gathering place. The restored former grocery warehouse on the railroad tracks pours a thoughtfully crafted, ever-changing lineup of beers - including bold IPAs, smooth wheats, and rich porters.

There is plenty for you, even if beer isn't your thing. Live music, events, and games are served with delicious food from their on-site food truck, like their famous smashburger or nachos. Guests linger in the warm, welcoming atmosphere that's perfect for families, four-legged friends, and laid-back evenings alike. Catering and space reservations are available for your special event. Whether you're planning a business social, hosting a special celebration, or simply unwinding after a long day, Crooked Finger Brewing blends history, hospitality, and handcrafted beer into one unforgettable experience.

name: Max's Treats
paragraphs: Max's Treats has earned a reputation for delivering more than just delicious desserts—it's a full-service catering company specializing in creating unforgettable experiences for any occasion. Founded and led by Maxine Garnto, who brings more than 30 years of culinary expertise, Max's Treats combines Southern charm with exceptional service. From weddings and corporate events to intimate family gatherings, their team provides complete catering solutions, complemented by beautifully crafted specialty cakes and desserts that have become a local favorite. Guests can also enjoy events at Max's Cottage, a charming on-site venue perfect for small parties, rehearsals, and celebrations. With a passion for food and hospitality, Max's Treats continues to be Dublin's trusted partner in making every event seamless, flavorful, and memorable.

name: Deanos
paragraphs: Deano's Italian, proudly owned and operated by the Shaffer family since 2009, is a downtown Dublin gem where tradition, flavor, and community come together. From the glow of the neon lights outside to the aroma of the imported Italian wood-burning oven inside, every visit feels like a warm welcome home. Known for homestyle Italian favorites, award-winning dishes, and rotating dessert specials like tiramisu, Deano's offers something for every appetite—from fresh salads and grilled fish to classic pizzas and pastas. Family-run and rooted in heart, every decision is made with care for customers, staff, and community. Whether you're celebrating a special moment or just grabbing a comforting meal, Deano's is the perfect spot for dinner, catering, or reconnecting with friends and family over unforgettable food.

name: Williamson's Bakery
paragraphs: Williamson's Bakery, centrally located in The Oaks Shopping Center, has delighted locals with its fresh, homemade baked goods for decades. A true Dublin institution for over 50 years, they start each day baking from scratch—famous for their old-fashioned doughnuts, doughnut holes, cookies, cupcakes, and savory treats like cheese straws. Founded as Blue Bird Bakery around 1927, it became Williamson's in 1965. It is now owned by Perry Williamson, who continues the legacy of heartfelt baking. Loyal customers praise the light, fluffy doughnuts and standout blueberry fritters. Whether you're craving a classic sugar-dusted doughnut or need a decorated cake for a celebration, Williamson's offers consistently delicious treats that keep happy tummies returning.

name: Rosie's
paragraphs: Rosie's Handmade Ice Cream is a hidden gem tucked behind the historic Dublin Theatre, with a welcoming pink glow that signals something special. This small-but-mighty downtown shop serves handmade ice cream crafted with premium ingredients and bold creativity. From the cult-favorite Butter Pecan to unique flavors like Blackberry Cheesecake and Caramel Macchiato, Rosie's regularly offers something new —making each visit a sweet surprise. Customer service is as exceptional as the ice cream, delivered with warmth and personality through their signature pink window. Beyond cones, Rosie's features sundaes, floats, and inventive treats that are as delightful as they are delicious. Whether you're just discovering Rosie's or making a return trip, each dip is a taste of joy in the heart of Dublin, GA.

name: Candace Jamaican Bar N Grill
paragraphs: Candace Jamaican Bar and Grill brings vibrant Jamaican flavors and a lively nightlife vibe to Dublin. Built from grassroots hustle, the laid-back eatery represents resilience, passion, and a deep love of community. Patrons rave about standout dishes like oxtail, curry goat, and jerk lamb chops, paired with a welcoming atmosphere and friendly service. Full portions, beautiful food presentation, imported soft drinks, weekly specials, and unique events characterize the space. The bar features a full liquor menu and all-day happy-hour specials that keep the energy alive until late. More than just a restaurant—it's a cultural and social hub that honors Jamaican culinary tradition, while nurturing community connection and opportunity.

name: Eden Nutrition
paragraphs: Eden Nutrition, established in 2020, is the local go-to destination for healthy, all- natural smoothies and smoothie bowls in Dublin, GA. Located inside the Olive Branch bookstore, Eden Nutrition offers delicious meal replacements and brain-boosting fuel made with high-quality ingredients and served with a smile. Whether you need a post-workout boost or a nutritious meal substitute, their customizable menu features powerful add-ons like protein, collagen, energy enhancers, and gluten-free options. Customers can call ahead for easy pickup or enjoy the convenience of workplace delivery on Mondays. You can also shop their healthy food options like locally made granola and gluten free baking mixes. With a passion for health and community, Eden Nutrition is more than just a smoothie shop—it's a place where wellness and fellowship thrive. Stop by and discover how healthy can also be refreshing, tasty, and energizing!

name: La Joya Mexican Restaurant
paragraphs: Don't let the unassuming storefront fool you! La Joya Mexican Restaurant is a cherished local spot celebrated for its generous portions of authentic Mexican cuisine and warm, family-style hospitality. From the moment guests sit down, they're greeted with fresh tortilla chips, house-made salsa, and a choice of verde and roja sauces. The menu features standout dishes like carnitas, bistec a la Mexicana, and street tacos fashioned with heart by the Castro family. One Wednesday a month, locals pack the house for Mexican hamburger day paired with a Mexican Coca-Cola or Jarritos soda. Known as a local hidden gem, La Joya delights with fresh ingredients, quick service, affordable prices, and family-friendly atmosphere— making it a standout among locals and visitors alike. La Joya is closed on Saturdays and Sundays, so make sure you visit during the week!

name: Mission Bake Shoppe
paragraphs: Nestled inside CURATE in the heart of downtown Dublin, Mission Bake Shoppe is a welcoming coffeehouse and bakery where Southern hospitality meets artisan quality. In its first year, the shop has earned praise for its scratch-made delights and custom espresso and matcha drinks. Signature items like the white chocolate raspberry cake, cinnamon rolls, sourdough, and homemade pretzels showcase wholesome ingredients and family-rooted baking traditions. The inviting aroma of fresh espresso fills the air, while friendly staff welcome each guest. Customers consistently rave about the warm service and melt-in-your-mouth treats served with care. Mission Bake Shoppe isn't just a place to grab a latte—it's a community gathering spot designed to inspire, refresh, and delight, one handcrafted pastry and espresso at a time.

name: Downtown Dublin
paragraphs: Downtown Dublin, Georgia, is alive with culture, history, and community connection. At its center, Theatre Dublin, a beautifully restored Art Deco landmark originally built in 1934, hosts everything from live concerts to film screenings to Broadway-style productions by Dublin Community Theatre.

Anchoring the square, the historic Carnegie Library, built in 1904, now serves as a cultural hub and event space, preserving its legacy as one of Georgia's earliest Carnegie libraries. Championed by the Friends of the Carnegie, a historic lecture series, educational outreach, and regional art exhibit are featured throughout the year.

The Market on Madison adds to the downtown experience with its scenic pavilion, walking trails, and award- winning Farmers Market. Along with always popular First Friday concerts during the summer, the Market is also home to the annual Farm to Table Dinner, Pig in the Park BBQ, and the Chili Cook-off and Fall Festival. It is the gathering place downtown for outdoor live music, food, art, and family fun.

name: Laurens County Rec Dept
paragraphs: The Dublin-Laurens County Recreation Authority invites the community to discover Southern Pines Regional Park—a premier, first-class recreation complex spanning 120 acres. Born from the 1999 merger of Dublin and Laurens County's recreation departments, the Authority offers unmatched variety: from an Ag Expo & Arena for livestock shows and rodeos to the family-favorite Southern Pines Water Park, as well as extensive athletic facilities including baseball and softball diamonds, football and soccer fields, pickleball courts, playgrounds, and walking trails. Whether hosting regional tournaments, community camps, or special events, the Authority is committed to promoting wellness, skill development, and community engagement, and continues to be a vibrant hub for residents and visitors alike.

name: Warriors Ranch
paragraphs: Warriors Wellness & Recovery Ranch is a compassionate 501(c)(3) nonprofit offering life-changing support to veterans, first responders, and their families. When these heroes give their all, Warriors Ranch is there to help them with the aftermath. At the heart of their mission are expert counseling, peer support, and holistic therapies to foster emotional recovery and build a sense of camaraderie and peace. Nestled on 19 acres, the ranch provides a serene, restorative environment for sessions ranging from PTSD treatment to family therapy, utilizing both traditional and innovative models. Whether you're seeking a safe space for healing or interested in volunteering or supporting their cause, Warriors Ranch stands as a powerful testament to community-driven well-being and hope.

name: Laurens County Library
paragraphs: Serving the community since 1904, The Laurens County Library traces its roots to a Carnegie grant. Built with vision and enduring purpose, the library remains a vital hub for literacy, learning, and resources for all. Patrons benefit from engaging programs and services like the 1000 Books Before Kindergarten initiative, 3D printing, the rich archival resources of the Heritage Center, robust online tools, and support for job seekers. Online access at home or on the go offers everything from ebooks, tutoring services, to legal resources. The library's commitment is to offer inspirational tools to inspire users and foster early literacy growth. Their vision looks ahead to keep the library relevant as a generational cornerstone for learning and community enrichment.

name: Curate
paragraphs: Founded in 2024 by Buffy Walker, Curate began as a step of faith that opened the door to a space where women entrepreneurs and creatives could thrive in both purpose and community.

Located in downtown Dublin's historic Mackey Perry Prior building, the once industrial warehouse has been thoughtfully transformed into a haven of inspiration. The space welcomes women into a supportive environment where they are seen, empowered, and equipped to pursue their dreams, while also fostering meaningful connections, building confidence, and providing the tools needed to thrive personally and professionally.

Today, Curate features a coffee shop, juice bar, macro meal grab-and-go, artisan marketplace, local artists gallery wall, and a private women's fitness studio. More than a business, Curate is a faith-driven movement where women champion one another, trust in God's timing, and grow in boldness—together.

name: Skn Bar Aesthetics & Wellness
paragraphs: Established in 2023, SknBar was born from a deeply personal mission: to combine 25 years of clinical expertise with a passion for healing, transformation, and community care. Dublin native and founder, Tabitha Mullis, a seasoned medical professional, envisioned more than just an aesthetic and wellness clinic—she envisioned a space for confidence, beauty, and renewal.

At SknBar, every treatment is personalized and intentional, blending advanced aesthetic technologies with holistic wellness practices. From glow-boosting facials to confidence-enhancing injectables and wellness treatments, each service is designed to help you feel radiant, refreshed, and completely restored.
Backed by clinical expertise paired with genuine care, SknBar offers a warm, client-centered experience where transformation runs deeper than skin. This is self-care redefined.

name: Georgia First
paragraphs: Are you frustrated with banks that are focused on their own profits instead of the customer's needs? Georgia First Bank is your local business and personal finance solution. Serving customers in rural Georgia since 1903, a Dublin Branch opened its doors in 2024 as a friendly and modern full-service location providing checking and savings accounts, personal, mortgage, and business loans, plus digital banking and telephone support. Georgia First combines community-focused service with modern financial tools and personalized decision-making. With dependable local decisions, relationship banking, and welcoming staff, the Dublin branch reflects Georgia First Bank's core values of trust and community commitment.

name: Mail & More
paragraphs: Mail & More has proudly served the Dublin community since 1997, offering a wide range of essential mailing and business services. Founded with a vision to help serve the community, the business continues to thrive under the local ownership of Audrey Hogan. Born and raised in Dublin, Audrey returned home after college to build a business rooted in family values and customer care. Mail & More is known for reliability and exceeding expectations with services like FedEx, UPS, USPS, and DHL shipping, secure mailbox rentals, professional packing, notary services, document shredding, and more. With a deep commitment to community and convenience, Mail & More continues to grow— dedicated to making life easier for every customer who walks through the door.

name: TLake Landscaping
paragraphs: T. Lake Environmental Design, founded by Tim Lake in 1990, is a full-service landscape architecture, planning, construction, and maintenance firm headquartered in East Dublin. The professionals at T. Lake deliver expert design and contracting services for a diverse client base, including industrial and office parks, hospitality and multi-family developments, public institutions, and upscale residential properties. Their work reflects a thoughtful approach to environmental design, emphasizing each space's context, history, and how people interact with it. With decades of experience and a strong local presence, T. Lake Environmental Design continues to shape and maintain functional, beautiful landscapes across Middle Georgia.

name: Lawn Squad Lawncare
paragraphs: The humidity and high temperatures of Georgia can take a toll on your yard, but your landscape can meet its full potential with the professional help of Lawn Squad.

T. Lake Environmental Design has partnered with this national network to bring expert lawn care right to your doorstep. They deliver customized lawn fertilization and weed-control plans designed for lush, green yards and scheduled treatments for disease, insects, fire ants, and grubs. Lawn Squad can also take care of expanded services like aeration, overseeding, and tree and shrub care! Their locally based team offers friendly, professional service and satisfaction-guaranteed workmanship. Lawn Squad of Central Georgia stands out for its reliable, comprehensive lawn care and commitment to making your outdoor space thrive.

name: Darley Law Firm
paragraphs: Darley Law Firm, located in charming downtown Dublin, is a highly regarded law practice offering personalized legal services in real estate and business law. Darley Law provides comprehensive support for both personal and professional legal needs with deep expertise in residential and commercial real estate—from property and mortgage closings to refinances and title insurance. They also offer business law services including LLC and corporate formation, operating agreements, and resolutions. Clients appreciate their efficient approach and commitment to creating seamless, stress-free experiences. As a trusted local legal partner, Darley Law Firm is a reliable choice for Dublin-area individuals and businesses seeking responsive, knowledgeable counsel.

name: Fairfield Inn & Suites
paragraphs: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Dublin delivers a relaxing and convenient stay just off I-16 near Exit 51 and is conveniently located about five minutes from downtown Dublin and adjacent to Dublin-Laurens Recreation Center. Guests start each morning with a complimentary hot breakfast featuring scrambled eggs, sausage, oatmeal, fresh fruit, and yogurt—all served in a welcoming setting. The hotel offers thoughtful amenities: free high-speed Wi-Fi, a seasonal outdoor pool, 24-hour fitness center, business center and meeting spaces, on-site laundry, and even electric vehicle charging. Guest rooms are equipped with refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers, and modern TVs with streaming options. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, Fairfield Inn & Suites provides comfort, value, and a strategic location that makes exploring Dublin effortless.

name: Curry Companies
paragraphs: Founded in 1902, Curry Companies has proudly served Middle Georgia with four generations of family ownership. What began as a small insurance agency has grown into a full-service real estate and property management firm, trusted for integrity, expertise, and community commitment. Over the decades, Curry Companies has developed residential subdivisions, self-storage facilities, apartments, shopping centers, and historic renovations in downtown Dublin, while continuing to provide tailored insurance services and expert real estate guidance. With deep roots and unmatched local knowledge, Curry Companies is dedicated to helping clients live, invest, and enjoy in the communities they call home. From insurance protection to property management and real estate development, Curry Companies remains a name synonymous with service and trust.

name: LaQuinta
paragraphs: Since opening in 2007, LaQuinta has welcomed guests from across Georgia, the U.S., and beyond—offering warm Southern hospitality and unbeatable value. What truly sets it apart is the exceptional staff: friendly, professional, and dedicated to making every stay enjoyable. Guests enjoy an outstanding product at a fair price, including comfortable rooms, excellent service, and the only indoor heated pool in town. The hotel is ideally located near local businesses, ball fields, shopping, restaurants, and area attractions—making it perfect for both business and leisure travel. Each morning begins with a delicious hot country breakfast, served with a smile. Whether you're visiting for work or play, this hotel is committed to delivering comfort, convenience, and a welcoming atmosphere that feels like home.

name: Chelle Realty
paragraphs: CHELLE Realty is a full-service, independent real estate company deeply rooted in community and client care. Based locally at 524 Academy Avenue, the firm serves all of Georgia, guiding buyers and sellers through residential, commercial, and investment real estate with expertise and personalized attention. Founded by Michelle Baird, her team of experienced agents and brokers are leaders in community service and volunteerism while remaining grounded in local knowledge and customer satisfaction. In addition to sales, the company now offers property management services through a dedicated Income Property Specialist. Chelle Realty is known for their professionalism, responsiveness, and tailored support—highlighting a true hometown feel with modern tools. Whether you're buying, selling, or renting, Chelle Realty delivers trusted service backed by results.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites
paragraphs: Nestled just off Interstate 16, Hampton Inn & Suites Dublin offers a welcoming home-away-from-home for travelers visiting Dublin, Georgia. Whether you're in town for business, family visits, or exploring the area's local attractions, the hotel combines comfort, convenience, and genuine hospitality.

Each room and suite is thoughtfully designed with modern touches, including free Wi‐Fi, cozy bedding, and spacious bathrooms, ensuring every guest feels at ease. Start your day with Hampton's signature hot breakfast before taking a dip in the seasonal outdoor pool, enjoying a workout in the fitness center, or exploring Dublin's charming shops and restaurants.

With attentive staff and amenities designed for both work and relaxation, Hampton Inn & Suites Dublin makes every stay effortless and memorable— where visitors feel like part of the community from the moment they arrive.

name: Home 2 Suites
paragraphs: Established in 2024, Home2 Suites by Hilton offers guests a true home away from home. Welcoming travelers from all walks of life, this modern 92-room extended stay hotel combines warm hospitality with thoughtful service to create a comfortable, inviting experience for both short visits and longer stays.

Located just off I-16 at Exit 51, the locally owned and operated Home2 Suites by Hilton is Dublin's newest hotel and the only extended stay property in the area. Spacious suites feature kitchenettes, complimentary Wi-Fi, and cozy living spaces designed for convenience and comfort. Guests enjoy a complimentary breakfast each morning, access to a fitness center, and an outdoor pool with grills for relaxing gatherings.
Proudly serving visitors to Dublin, Home2 Suites by Hilton is dedicated to providing clean accommodations and an engaging guest experience where everyone feels they truly belong.

name: The Medical Center
paragraphs: Since 1964, the Medical Center has been more than just a family practice clinic—it's been a trusted partner in the health and well-being of the community. When you visit for a regularly scheduled appointment or for urgent care, you see a physician every time. Centrally located at 908 Hillcrest Parkway, their dedicated team of family practice physicians and staff provide compassionate, comprehensive care six days a week. Whether it's a routine wellness check, an urgent care visit, X-rays, MRI, cardiac tests, or labwork, patients can count on attentive service in a welcoming environment.

With extended weekday and weekend hours and a focus on prevention as well as treatment, the Medical Center is committed to keeping families healthy at every stage of life. Their mission is simple: to make quality healthcare accessible for all of Dublin and surrounding communities.

name: Med Spa
paragraphs: Established in 2006, MedSpa Dublin has been a trusted name in the community for delivering luxurious aesthetic services with a focus on personal care and professional expertise. The spa offers a serene escape where clients enjoy personalized treatments administered by well-trained, certified providers—ensuring every visit feels both indulgent and effective.

Specializing in non-surgical, anti-aging solutions and a wide range of aesthetic treatments—from Botox and dermal fillers to chemical peels, laser therapies, and renewing facials—MedSpa Dublin customizes each service to suit individual goals and skin concerns.
With a dedication to warm, confidential care paired with cutting-edge techniques, MedSpa Dublin stands as the premier destination for refined self-care and beauty.

name: Hughston Clinic Orthopedics
paragraphs: At Hughston Clinic, we provide superior, patient-centered orthopaedic care as part of a physician-owned, multi-specialty group. Our mission is to improve lives, strengthen community health, and shape the future of medicine.

We offer an integrated system of research, education, and treatment that puts patients first. With Centers of Excellence in spine, upper and lower extremities, trauma, and total joint replacement, our award-winning care is delivered by specialty-trained physicians and dedicated healthcare professionals focused on one goal— our patients.

Hughston's vertically integrated practice combines outstanding facilities, innovative technology, and strong corporate support to maximize efficiency, streamline cost, and provide affordable healthcare without sacrificing quality.

Dr. Dustin Gay and Dr. Heath Richter proudly serve as team physicians for the Macon Mayhem, Trinity Christian School, East Laurens Schools, West Laurens Schools, and Johnson County Schools. Whether on the sidelines or in the clinic, we're committed to helping our local community stay healthy, active, and strong.

name: Fairview Fitness
paragraphs: Established in 1986, Fairview Fitness Center has proudly remained the longest-standing fitness facility in Dublin and Laurens County. Known for its all-inclusive, family-oriented environment, the center offers a welcoming space where health and community go hand in hand. Whether guests are new or established, the team finds joy in helping every member pursue a healthier, more vibrant life—because living your best life starts with feeling your best. Open to the public and operating 24/7, Fairview Fitness Center caters to all interests and fitness levels. From a refreshing indoor pool and relaxing sauna to energizing group fitness classes and racquetball courts, there's something for everyone. Committed to excellence for nearly four decades, Fairview Fitness Center continues to set the standard as the area's premier location for health, fitness, and wellness.

name: Bass Rehab
paragraphs: Bass Physical Therapy and Rehabilitation Center, Inc., founded in 1965 by Charles E. Bass, Sr., is one of Georgia's pioneering private physical therapy clinics. Beyond his dedication to healthcare, Mr. Bass was deeply involved in community fundraisers and charitable initiatives, including supporting the creation of Laurens Memorial Hospital's first ICU. He passionately demonstrated a deep commitment to the community—a legacy that lives on today.

Now in its third generation, Bass Physical Therapy remains a family owned and operated business dedicated to serving Dublin and Laurens County with the same care and personal touch that has defined it for six decades.

Proudly serving their community, the Bass family is honored to uphold a legacy of compassionate care and heartfelt service—dedicated to supporting the health and well-being of every patient for years to come.

name: Dublin Eye Associates
paragraphs: For more than four decades, Dublin Eye Associates has provided trusted, comprehensive eye care to families across Middle Georgia. This locally owned practice offers expert ophthalmology and optometry services—from routine eye exams and custom glasses to advanced treatment and surgeries for cataracts, glaucoma, and LASIK. Need a new pair of readers or sunglasses? Walk in and try them on at their optical shop. With a full-service optical center on-site and an ambulatory surgery center, patients benefit from seamless, thoughtful care delivered by a diverse team of specialists. Dublin Eye Associates blends professional expertise, personalized service, and modern convenience, making it a trusted partner in preserving vision and enhancing eye health for the Dublin community and beyond.

name: Georgia Hospice Care
paragraphs: Serving Dublin and surrounding counties, Georgia Hospice Care is a trusted choice for families seeking clinical excellence with comfort, compassion, and dignity.

We serve with love and provide the highest level of care during the end-of-life journey, creating meaningful experiences for our patients and families. Across all 159 counties in our state, we provide care wherever our patients call home.

We are proud to be a USA Today Top Workplace - a distinction based solely on employee feedback on company culture. Our care team holds a CMS 5-Star Rating for Hospice Quality of Care and Patient/Caregiver Experience. We offer specialty programs like Dementia Capable Care and We Honor Veterans, and we exceed the national benchmark for visits in the last seven days of life so we can be present with our patients and families when they need us most.

name: Dublin Yoga & Pilates
paragraphs: Dublin Yoga and Pilates is a premier destination for mindful movement and holistic wellness in downtown Dublin, Georgia. Founded by certified instructor Jordan Willis, the studio offers a diverse range of classes designed to nurture strength, flexibility, and inner balance. From dynamic Vinyasa flows and core-focused Pilates to soothing Yin yoga and energetic Hip-Hop Happy Hour sessions, every class welcomes participants of all skill levels in a supportive, inclusive environment. Dublin Yoga and Pilates blends purpose with motion to help students cultivate physical vitality and mental clarity. Whether seeking stress relief, improved mobility, or community connection, clients benefit from experienced instructors who guide and inspire. The studio invites locals and visitors alike to discover the transformative power of mindful movement and leave feeling energized and centered.

name: The Medicine Cabinet
paragraphs: The Medicine Cabinet of Dublin is a locally owned pharmacy offering a full suite of modern conveniences and personalized care. Their drive-thru window ensures quick service, while free prescription delivery and an easy online refill system make managing medications effortless—from home or on the go. The pharmacy also features expert compounding services, allowing them to customize injected, oral solutions, and encapsulated medications for specialized needs. In-store you find a variety of wound care supplies, specialty vitamins, and high quality CBD products. The Medicine Cabinet pharmacy excels in providing tailored, high-tech pharmaceutical care with warmth and reliability.

name: Emerald City Treasures
paragraphs: Emerald City Treasures in Dublin, Georgia, is a captivating treasure trove located at 1401 Telfair Street—just minutes from downtown and I-16. Guests can get lost browsing through an expansive collection of American antiques, Depression-era glassware, silverplate, period décor, vintage toys, vinyl records, and sparkling jewelry. The boutique also showcases artisan-made regional goods, such as handcrafted soaps, local honey, and fresh sourdough - creating a uniquely local shopping experience.

Its sister location, Emerald City Treasures Too, at 1807 Rice Avenue in the Williamsburg Shopping Center, expands the creative inventory with rustic primitives, farmhouse-style décor, and Dublin-made memorabilia. Together, both locations serve as Dublin's beloved destination for treasure hunters, artists, and gift-seekers—fusing nostalgia with community creativity in every corner.

name: Bar Bridal
paragraphs: Located in the heart of downtown Dublin, Bar Bridal offers a luxury bridal experience with a small-town feel. With a heart for service and a passion for detail, this premier bridal boutique is devoted to building meaningful relationships with brides and their families—turning special moments into lasting memories.

The boutique delivers a personalized bridal experience that's as memorable as the dress itself. From the first consultation to final fitting, every gown is tailored to reflect the bride's unique style, fit, and vision.
Driven by a passion for service, elegance, and connection, Bar Bridal is a place where love stories are celebrated, memories are made, and unforgettable wedding journeys truly begin.

name: Smith's Jewelry
paragraphs: Founded in 1911 by William Smith, Smith's has stood as a timeless treasure in the heart of downtown Dublin for over a century. Renowned for its fine jewelry, elegant tableware, and thoughtfully curated gifts, Smith's is celebrated for perfecting the details, ensuring every selection is as memorable as the occasion it honors. Since 2015, sixth-generation owner Natalie Curry has carried forward this proud legacy, thoughtfully renovating the historic storefront to preserve its charm while introducing refined, modern touches. Guests are welcomed with warm, personalized service and expertise with GIA-certified appraisals, custom design, engraving, and repair. Whether creating a bridal registry, selecting an heirloom, or marking life's milestones, Smith's remains the quintessential destination where elegance, tradition, and heartfelt service come together.

name: Plum Alley
paragraphs: For over forty years, Plum Alley has offered a curated selection of stylish women's clothing, along with personal and heartfelt service that keeps customers returning again and again. Store owner, Kim Hatchett, and her team have a passion for helping women find the perfect outfit, and many shoppers have become long-time friends. Kim takes time to understand each customer's style and even serves as a personal shopper, offering guidance when customers want an opinion. She knows her inventory inside and out and often updates regular shoppers when the perfect piece arrives.

Plum Alley specializes in helping women find outfits that make them feel confident and beautiful. Whether it's a wardrobe refresh or a special-occasion look, customers know they'll be guided with care, honesty, and expertise.
Plum Alley continues to be a cornerstone of the community, combining fashion with friendship- and making every woman feel fabulous, one outfit at a time.

name: Roche Farm & Garden
paragraphs: Founded in 1929, Roche Farm & Garden, Inc. has been a trusted source for quality farm, garden, and feed supplies for over four decades. Located at 803 E. Jackson Street, this family-owned, full-service center supplies everyone from home gardeners to professional landscapers, offering more than 10,000 in-stock items—including seeds, lawn care products, hardware, clothing, live chickens, and unique outdoor décor. Known for friendly, knowledgeable service and fair prices, Roche Farm & Garden has earned a loyal following in Laurens and surrounding counties. For more than forty years it remains a go-to destination for expert gardening advice, premium products, and a welcoming, hometown shopping experience that has stood the test of time.

name: Sir Shop
paragraphs: The Sir Shop, celebrating 50 years in Dublin, is the go-to destination for men's clothing—offering timeless style and personalized service. This full-line menswear retailer features an extensive selection of high-quality dress and casual items, formal wear, footwear, formal rentals, and accessories. Brands like Poncho, Peter Millar, Jack Victor and Duck Head are showcased alongside Sir Shop's custom line of clothing. Shoppers appreciate the knowledgeable, attentive staff who assist with fit and fashion—from classic suits and silk ties to golf apparel and shoes. Looking for a gift? Their extensive collection of accessories and gifts along with complimentary gift wrapping make occasions a breeze. Whether you are looking for a traditional fit, or the latest styles, Sir Shop consistently delivers quality men's clothing with personal service.

name: The Olive Branch
paragraphs: For over 40 years, The Olive Branch has been a cornerstone of faith and encouragement in Dublin. Originally Pinholster Bookstore, it was lovingly renamed by the Flanders, who built a mission-focused business grounded in their love for Christ and a desire to serve others. Under new ownership, The Olive Branch continues to offer a wide range of inspirational products including Bibles, Christian books, study guides, journals, music, and gifts for every occasion. You can shop on their website and have your items delivered to your door, or visit their friendly, helpful staff in their central Dublin location. From wedding and baby gifts to church supplies and special orders, customers appreciate the thoughtful selections, while gift-wrapping and engraving services make every purchase feel personal. Tucked in the back, Eden Nutrition provides a refreshing treat, rounding out this unique and uplifting shopping experience for locals and visitors alike.

name: Emma Laura
paragraphs: Since 1983, Emma Laura has been a cherished part of the Dublin community, known for its fashionable finds and genuine, personalized service. In 2024, Rachel Gay stepped in as the new owner, bringing a fresh perspective, a love for current trends, and a mission to help every woman feel her best.

Emma Laura isn't just a boutique—it's a place where connections are made. The dedicated team takes pride in building lasting relationships with customers and their families, creating a shopping experience that feels more like visiting friends.

Rachel is devoted to upholding Emma Laura's legacy while guiding it into the future—broadening its storefront and enhancing its online presence to serve both longtime customers and those discovering this cherished boutique for the first time.

name: Colleen's China
paragraphs: Established in 1989 by Sally Willis and her mother, Colleen's was born from a shared love of elegant tabletop décor and a passion for serving others. What began as a branch of the beloved Colleen's Flower Shop has grown into one of Dublin's most cherished gift stores—celebrating 36 years under the same dedicated ownership.

Colleen's is known for exceptional customer service and a thoughtfully curated selection of gifts, perfect for weddings, holidays, and everyday celebrations. From helping brides and grooms build their dream registries to assisting shoppers in finding the perfect gift, Colleen's brings warmth and care to every interaction.
Proudly serving the Dublin community and beyond with an exclusive collection of unique gifts and home accents, Colleen's China provides the attention to detail every celebration deserves.
